definition: A device typically found in kitchens, used to grind a certain aromatic substance into smaller particles, often employed in the preparation of a popular hot beverage.

examples.german: Die Kaffeemühle mahlt den Kaffee fein.
examples.english: The coffee grinder grinds the coffee finely.
I use an electric coffee grinder.
The coffee grinder is made of stainless steel.
My coffee grinder has different grind settings.
The coffee grinder is very noisy.
